metadata.title: madesmart Antimicrobial Classic Large Silverware Tray Soft Grip, Non-Slip Kitchen Drawer, 6 Compartments, Multi-Purpose Home Organization, EPA Certified, White
features: DRAWER SILVERWARE TRAY: A six-compartment tray that fits in most kitchen drawers to help with silverware and utensil organization
PREMIER DESIGN: Rounded corners and soft-grip lining make this silverware tray highly functional, easy-to-clean, and aesthetically pleasing
SLEEK APPEAL: Features branded icons for simple sorting of flatware, while non-slip feet and soft-grip lining to ensure items stay in their place
ELITE MATERIALS: Made from a long-lasting, high-quality plastic for an efficient and durable finish

ANTIMICROBIAL: Inhibits the growth of that causes stain and odor on the product’s surface, reinforces the integrity of the product, and provides a long-lasting organization experience for ultimate peace of mind
description: The madesmart® Antimicrobial Classic Silverware Tray is a six-compartment tray that fits in most kitchen drawers to help with silverware and utensil organization. This luxe storage solution helps organize your kitchen while contributing to your clean, sleek decor. The rounded corners and soft-grip lining make this silverware tray highly functional, easy-to-clean, and visually pleasing. Each sleek compartment boasts a minimalist flatware icon, granting additional aesthetics and a helping hand towards your organizational processes. It features non-slip feet to ensure items stay in their place, and the top-rate tray will remain still no matter how fast you open the drawer. Crafted with nothing but the best, this premium storage solution is made from top-quality plastic that is infused with an EPA certified antimicrobial additive to resist growth that causes stains or odors.
